attributes.description: This dashboard shows Detection logs collected by the Extrahop integration.

params.markdown:
#### ExtraHop
 
**Detection**  

#### Description

This dashboard provides detailed visibility into threat detections within the ExtraHop platform using the Detection data stream. 

It shows detections by type, category, status, and resolution to highlight common threat patterns and outcomes. A line chart tracks detection trends over time, while metrics display the average and maximum risk scores along with the number of recommended detections. Bar charts highlight top MITRE tactics and techniques, and show detection status by assignee to monitor analyst workload. A table provides key detection details including timestamp, name, status, resolution, risk score, tactic, technique, and assignee for better visibility and tracking.

**[Integration Page](/app/integrations/detail/extrahop/overview)**

attributes.title: [Logs ExtraHop] Detection
